sections.heading: (1) of this 2005 Act
sections.text:
[130.505 (1)] does not apply to a trust created under an instrument executed

before the effective date of this 2005 Act [January 1, 2006]. [2005 c.348 �47]

sections.heading: of this 2021 Act
sections.text:
[130.518] and the amendments to ORS 130.315 by section 8 of this 2021 Act apply

to tenancy by the entirety property conveyed to a trustee or trustees of a

trust or trusts on or after the effective date of this 2021 Act [January 1,

2022]. [2021 c.272 �12]

sections.heading: was enacted into law by
sections.text:
the Legislative Assembly but was not added to or made a part of ORS chapter 130

or any series therein by legislative action. See Preface to Oregon Revised

Statutes for further explanation.

sections.heading: to 130.910 were enacted
sections.text:
into law by the Legislative Assembly but were not added to or made a part of

ORS chapter 130 or any series therein by legislative action. See Preface to
